title: Definitions
context: ยง195-2 Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless otherwise indicated by the context: &ldquo;Board&rdquo; means the board of land and natural resources. &ldquo;Commission&rdquo; means the natural area reserves system commission. &ldquo;Cooperating entity&rdquo; or &ldquo;cooperator&rdquo; means a private nonprofit land-holding organization or any other body deemed by the department as satisfactorily able to assist in the identification, acquisition, and management of natural area reserves. &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of land and natural resources. &ldquo;Heritage program&rdquo; means a comprehensive natural resource inventory data base for public information that includes the location of rare plants, animals, and natural communities (ecosystems) in the State. &ldquo;Landowner&rdquo; means any person or entity having the fee simple interest in land in the State. &ldquo;Natural area reserve&rdquo; means an area designated as a part of the Hawaii natural area reserves system, pursuant to criteria established by the commission. [L 1970, c 139, pt of ยง1; am L 1987, c 350, ยง2; am L 1991, c 326, ยง2]
